alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 30 at 7:53AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with damaging gusts up to 65 mph are expected. Isolated gusts to 75 mph are possible in the most wind-prone locations this morning. * WHERE...Malibu Coast, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Santa Susana Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
